attributes.action: revoke the new 2012 logo and get our money back
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Although we the people support the holding of the Olympics in London in 2012, 
we also see the initial budget already spiralling beyond control. We object to 
the government raiding the National Lottery Fund, thus sacrificing many local 
and worthy causes,  particularly when we see £400K being spent on a graphically 
inept logo. Which ever way you cut it, we the taxpayers of this fine country 
are incredulous at the wilful misuse of publicly derived funding and demand our 
money back.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
